name: Roundabout Free
summary:
Roundabout is an original arcade concept that revolves around scoring points by dodging objects that spawn from the corners of an arena in which you are trapped.  
  
You place your finger anywhere on the screen and drag to move around the arena, this is no easy task as the arena is spinning around in a trippy, hypnotizing way!  
   
It's an endless game, so it gets progressively harder, the arena keeps spinning faster so the player loses his reference point and gets disoriented while obstacles can randomly spawn from any corner, this combined with bosses who each have unique mechanics makes this a challenging skill-based game.
